column2: "Dabi a nna Moses rohwɛ n'asew Jetro
column5: ɔkaa hɔn kɔr sar no ekyir noho
column6: na odur Nyankopɔn bepɔw Horeb ho."

column2: "Na EWURADZE bɔfoe beyii noho edzi kyerɛɛ no wɔ haban bi finimfin gyaframee mu: na ɔhwɛe
"Na EWURADZE hun dɛ ɔaman rohwɛ no
column3: Nyankopɔn fii haban no mu frɛɛ no
Mma nntwe mmpin ha: yiyi w'ananadze mpaboa no
column4: na bea a igyina do no yɛ asaase krɔnkrɔn."

column6: nye Jakob Nyankopɔn no. Na Moses dze n'enyim sumae; osiandɛ osuroo dɛ ɔbɔhwɛ Nyankopɔn."

column3: Ampaara mehu me man a wɔwɔ Egypt hɔn amandzehu
column4: na matse hɔn su a hɔn abɔmbaafo no ntsi wosu no; na minyim hɔn awerɛhow ntsi;"

column2: "na mesian dɛ miribeyi hɔn wɔ Egyptfo nsamu
column3: na metutu hɔn mefi asaase no do makɔ asaase pa a ɔso do
column4: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do; Keenanfo
Israel hɔn su edu m'enyim: nkyii so mehu ɔhaw a Egyptfo dze haw hɔn no."
ma eekeyi me man Israelmba no efi Egypt efir."
na maakɔ Farao nkyɛn ekeyi Israelmba efi Egypt efir?"

column3: Ampaara mibedzi w'ekyir; na iyi bɛyɛ wo asɛnkyerɛdze dɛ mara na masoma wo. Na sɛ inya yi ɔman no fi Egypt ba a
column4: hom bɔsom Nyankopɔn wɔ bepɔw yi do."

column6: Hom egyanom Nyankopɔn na ɔasoma me hom hɔ; na wobisa me dɛ

column3: MARA NYE MARA NO:  na ɔsee dɛ
column5: MARA no na ɔasoma me hom hɔ."
column7: 8 #3.14 MARA NYE MARA: Iyi yɛ dzin a Nyankopɔn dze frɛɛ noho kyerɛɛ Moses."

column2: "Na nkyii so Nyankopɔn see Moses dɛ
column9: na ɔasoma me hom hɔ: iyi nye me dzin daa
column10: na iyi nye me nkaadze kɔ ebusuasantsen nyinara mu."

column13: na mehu dza wɔdze reyɛ hom wɔ Egypt no:"

column3: Mibeyi hom efi Egypt amandzehu no mu akɔ Keenanfo
column9: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do."

column3: nye Israel mpanyimfo nkɔ Egypthen no nkyɛn
column7: nye hɛn ehyia mu: na afei yɛserɛ wo
column8: ma yɛnkɔ sar do ndaansa kwan nkɔbɔ afɔr mma EWURADZE

column2: "Na minyim dɛ Egypthen remma hom kwan ma wɔnnkɔ
column4: nnyɛ nsa a ɔyɛ dzen do a."

column3: na medze anwanwadze a mebɛyɛ wɔ no mu hɔ no mabɔ Egypt: na ɔno n'ekyir na ɔbɛma hom akɔ."

column2: "Na mebɛma ɔman yi enyim aba nyam wɔ Egyptfo enyim: na ɔbɛba dɛ

column3: na ne fie ɔmamforanyi dwetɛ edwindze
column5: nye atam: na hom dze ahyehyɛ hom mbabanyin nye hom mbabaa; na hom bɛfa Egyptfo no afo."
